# Finger of Death (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Druid Spells|Druid 8]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 16]], [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 282

This spell instantly delivers 10 points of damage per caster level. If the targetâ€™s Fortitude saving throw succeeds, it instead takes 3d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level. The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds on its saving throw.
